question.questionText: Design a way to use carbon printing to find out if 2 Labrador retrievers have the same paw patterns. How will you know if the 2 dogs have paw patterns that are the same?

referenceAnswers.referenceAnswer: Compare prints to see if the patterns are the same.

studentAnswers.studentAnswer: Look really carefully at the paper and see if it is the same.
Because there is small dogs and huge dogs.
Because they may be arches, whorl and loop.
The figure, texture, shape, and how it looks.
